message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This product truly delivers exceptional value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I'm still not convinced that $19,000 is a good deal for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000. Can you consider that?
